parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Host the mp mission described by config class. Should be called as reaction to some UI action in some dialog.<br>
For example you can start a MP scenario from a button. It creates a host and takes you to the lobby with the scenario loaded.<br>
You need to provide the display which is active when the hostMission command is called.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[hostMission]] [pConfig, pDisplay]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pConfig, pDisplay]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pConfig: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pDisplay: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hostMission]] [configMissionName, display];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hostMission]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[configFile]] >> "CfgMissions" >> "MPMissions" >> _scenarioClassName, _currentlyActiveDisplay];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> '''<template><title>arma3</title></template>:''' Launch host mission dialog from a client on dedicated server:
<code>[[hostMission]] [
	[[configFile]] >> "CfgMissions" >> "MPmissions" >> "MP_COOP_m01",
	[[findDisplay]] 46
];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playScriptedMission]], [[playMission]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 03, 2011</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:kju|kju]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The command must be called in the main menu or something similar menu it seems.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
